message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $75?
I understand that $90 might be a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $82. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $78?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $81. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $79?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $80. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
